recipes.label: Set off on a Pilgrimage?
recipes.startdescription: If I wish to explore the places which are more True than Real and sail beyond the limitations of the world, I could follow in the footsteps of the Centipede. Morland has indicated she could tell me where to take the first step.

recipes.label: Find my missing Half?
recipes.startdescription: My soul has been split, and I have been born a bleeding, aching half-self. My other half is somewhere out there across the seven seas. If I find them, I can complete myself; if I complete myself, I can find them.
